reviewText: Could have been a really great show if they hadn't tried to make it reality show style. The narrator is annoying and they get off the subject a lot (talking about modern tanks that have nothing to do with the episode). Good overall but could have been much better.
It was overall a good show, I wish it had "made it" and become a regular series. Much more informative than what passes for "reality" TV these days.
Have always liked tanks (WW2) and this is certainly a treat to see them recondition and bring back these old workhorses.
